cpu.h
1// Copyright 2006-2013 the V8 project authors. All rights reserved.
2// Use of this source code is governed by a BSD-style license that can be
3// found in the LICENSE file.
4
5// This module contains the architecture-specific code. This make the rest of
6// the code less dependent on differences between different processor
7// architecture.
8// The classes have the same definition for all architectures. The
9// implementation for a particular architecture is put in cpu_<arch>.cc.
10// The build system then uses the implementation for the target architecture.
11//
12
13#ifndef V8_BASE_CPU_H_
14#define V8_BASE_CPU_H_
15
16#include "src/base/base-export.h"
17#include "src/base/macros.h"
18
19namespace v8 {
20namespace base {
21
22// ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
23// CPU
24//
25// Query information about the processor.
26//
27// This class also has static methods for the architecture specific functions.
28// Add methods here to cope with differences between the supported
29// architectures. For each architecture the file cpu_<arch>.cc contains the
30// implementation of these static functions.
31
32class V8_BASE_EXPORT CPU final {
33 public:
34 CPU();
35
36 // x86 CPUID information
37 const char* vendor() const { return vendor_; }
38 int stepping() const { return stepping_; }
39 int model() const { return model_; }
40 int ext_model() const { return ext_model_; }
41 int family() const { return family_; }
42 int ext_family() const { return ext_family_; }
43 int type() const { return type_; }
44
45 // arm implementer/part information
46 int implementer() const { return implementer_; }
47 static const int kArm = 0x41;
48 static const int kNvidia = 0x4e;
49 static const int kQualcomm = 0x51;
50 int architecture() const { return architecture_; }
51 int variant() const { return variant_; }
52 static const int kNvidiaDenver = 0x0;
53 int part() const { return part_; }
54
55 // ARM-specific part codes
56 static const int kArmCortexA5 = 0xc05;
57 static const int kArmCortexA7 = 0xc07;
58 static const int kArmCortexA8 = 0xc08;
59 static const int kArmCortexA9 = 0xc09;
60 static const int kArmCortexA12 = 0xc0c;
61 static const int kArmCortexA15 = 0xc0f;
62
63 // Denver-specific part code
64 static const int kNvidiaDenverV10 = 0x002;
65
66 // PPC-specific part codes
67 enum {
68 kPPCPower5,
69 kPPCPower6,
70 kPPCPower7,
71 kPPCPower8,
72 kPPCPower9,
73 kPPCPower10,
74 kPPCG4,
75 kPPCG5,
76 kPPCPA6T
77 };
78
79 // General features
80 bool has_fpu() const { return has_fpu_; }
81 int icache_line_size() const { return icache_line_size_; }
82 int dcache_line_size() const { return dcache_line_size_; }
83 static const int kUnknownCacheLineSize = 0;
84
85 // x86 features
86 bool has_cmov() const { return has_cmov_; }
87 bool has_sahf() const { return has_sahf_; }
88 bool has_mmx() const { return has_mmx_; }
89 bool has_sse() const { return has_sse_; }
90 bool has_sse2() const { return has_sse2_; }
91 bool has_sse3() const { return has_sse3_; }
92 bool has_ssse3() const { return has_ssse3_; }
93 bool has_sse41() const { return has_sse41_; }
94 bool has_sse42() const { return has_sse42_; }
95 bool has_osxsave() const { return has_osxsave_; }
96 bool has_avx() const { return has_avx_; }
97 bool has_avx2() const { return has_avx2_; }
98 bool has_avx_vnni() const { return has_avx_vnni_; }
99 bool has_fma3() const { return has_fma3_; }
100 bool has_f16c() const { return has_f16c_; }
101 bool has_bmi1() const { return has_bmi1_; }
102 bool has_bmi2() const { return has_bmi2_; }
103 bool has_lzcnt() const { return has_lzcnt_; }
104 bool has_popcnt() const { return has_popcnt_; }
105 bool is_atom() const { return is_atom_; }
106 bool has_intel_jcc_erratum() const { return has_intel_jcc_erratum_; }
107 bool has_cetss() const { return has_cetss_; }
108 bool has_non_stop_time_stamp_counter() const {
109 return has_non_stop_time_stamp_counter_;
110 }
111 bool is_running_in_vm() const { return is_running_in_vm_; }
112 bool exposes_num_virtual_address_bits() const {
113 return num_virtual_address_bits_ != kUnknownNumVirtualAddressBits;
114 }
115 int num_virtual_address_bits() const {
116 DCHECK(exposes_num_virtual_address_bits());
117 return num_virtual_address_bits_;
118 }
119 static const int kUnknownNumVirtualAddressBits = 0;
120
121 // arm features
122 bool has_idiva() const { return has_idiva_; }
123 bool has_neon() const { return has_neon_; }
124 bool has_thumb2() const { return has_thumb2_; }
125 bool has_vfp() const { return has_vfp_; }
126 bool has_vfp3() const { return has_vfp3_; }
127 bool has_vfp3_d32() const { return has_vfp3_d32_; }
128 bool has_jscvt() const { return has_jscvt_; }
129 bool has_dot_prod() const { return has_dot_prod_; }
130 bool has_lse() const { return has_lse_; }
131 bool has_mte() const { return has_mte_; }
132 bool has_pmull1q() const { return has_pmull1q_; }
133 bool has_fp16() const { return has_fp16_; }
134
135 // mips features
136 bool is_fp64_mode() const { return is_fp64_mode_; }
137 bool has_msa() const { return has_msa_; }
138
139 // riscv-specific part codes
140 bool has_rvv() const { return has_rvv_; }
141 enum class RV_MMU_MODE {
142 kRiscvSV39,
143 kRiscvSV48,
144 kRiscvSV57,
145 };
146 RV_MMU_MODE riscv_mmu() const { return riscv_mmu_; }
147
148 private:
149#if defined(V8_OS_STARBOARD)
150 bool StarboardDetectCPU();
151#endif
152 char vendor_[13];
153 int stepping_;
154 int model_;
155 int ext_model_;
156 int family_;
157 int ext_family_;
158 int type_;
159 int implementer_;
160 int architecture_;
161 int variant_;
162 int part_;
163 int icache_line_size_;
164 int dcache_line_size_;
165 int num_virtual_address_bits_;
166 bool has_fpu_;
167 bool has_cmov_;
168 bool has_sahf_;
169 bool has_mmx_;
170 bool has_sse_;
171 bool has_sse2_;
172 bool has_sse3_;
173 bool has_ssse3_;
174 bool has_sse41_;
175 bool has_sse42_;
176 bool is_atom_;
177 bool has_intel_jcc_erratum_;
178 bool has_cetss_;
179 bool has_osxsave_;
180 bool has_avx_;
181 bool has_avx2_;
182 bool has_avx_vnni_;
183 bool has_fma3_;
184 bool has_f16c_;
185 bool has_bmi1_;
186 bool has_bmi2_;
187 bool has_lzcnt_;
188 bool has_popcnt_;
189 bool has_idiva_;
190 bool has_neon_;
191 bool has_thumb2_;
192 bool has_vfp_;
193 bool has_vfp3_;
194 bool has_vfp3_d32_;
195 bool has_jscvt_;
196 bool has_dot_prod_;
197 bool has_lse_;
198 bool has_mte_;
199 bool has_pmull1q_;
200 bool has_fp16_;
201 bool is_fp64_mode_;
202 bool has_non_stop_time_stamp_counter_;
203 bool is_running_in_vm_;
204 bool has_msa_;
205 RV_MMU_MODE riscv_mmu_;
206 bool has_rvv_;
207};
208
209} // namespace base
210} // namespace v8
211
212#endif // V8_BASE_CPU_H_
